features: STICKY GROUNG RUBBER LIP : Soft rubber lip seamlessly adheres to the ground, creates a strong seal between floor and dustpan. Sweeping the floor without leaking ash, without leaving any small debris and dust.

HIGH-QUALITY MATERIALS : Upgrade Broom and Dustpan The bottom and interface of dustpan broom are made of stable and durable plastic. The pole is made of metal. Soft and heavy duty broom hard bristles effectively grabs dust and dirt. You can clean just by standing instead of bending over
FULL COMB TEETH : Just comb gently can scrape off the hair and rubbish of the broom bristles. Solve all kinds of hair problems, no need to drag by hand, easy to clean the hair and dust on the broom.

LONG EXPANDABLE POLE : The dustpan and broomstick consist of 2 and 3 segments respectively. People can choose the right length according to their height. The long handle allows you to clean upright and no longer bend to reduce waist stress

FOLDABLE STAND-UP STORAGE : Just clip the broom to the dustpan plastic handle for upright storage. It can be stored in the gaps of refrigerators, sinks, washing machines, etc. to save space and keep your home or work space clean and tidy. (BE AWARE !!if Any concern you have,Please Contact us through Our store front page "Ask a Question" with your order ID)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: If you are looking for a broom and dust pan, any easy way to sweep office, house, kitchen, outdoors and indoors, YOUSHANGJIA Long Handled Broom with Dustpan is a perfect and clever choice. Dimensions: Material:Top grade PP plastic , metal Boom Height: 52 in Wide:10.5in ; Dustpan Height :36 in Wide:10.5 in Color: green Package include: 1 x Broom 1 x Dustpan

HIGH-QUALITY MATERIALS : Rubber Lip & Thick Broom Bristles Design perfect for sweeping indoor dust and debris, especially for pet hair, allowing no spill. Upgrade Broom and Dustpan The bottom and interface of dustpan broom are made of stable and durable plastic.The pole is made of metal. Soft and heavy duty broom hard bristles effectively grabs dust and dirt. You can clean just by standing instead of bending over. Soft rubber lip seamlessly adheres to the ground, creates a strong seal between floor and dustpan, no gap between the floor and dustpan, Broom bristles are thick and moderately soft effectively grabs dust and dirt., easy to clean up.

Sturdy Broom and Dustpan Heavy Duty Plastic Construction Creative windproof broom and dustpan set with comb is designed to free your hands, and make it easier to collect wastes,gently combing can wipe off the pet hair and human hair on the broom. They no longer get swept over the edge like open dustpans .

Heavy duty Broom bristles Long Expandable Handle Rubber Lip & Thick Broom Bristles Design Broom snaps into dustpan for upright, compact storage.keep your home or work space clean and tidy.Works perfectly for multi-surface, friendly and cleans everything from tile floors to garage floors,Hardwood Floor,For Indoor use.

FOLDABLE STAND-UP STORAGE There are two ways to store it, which can be hung on the wall through a hole in the broom handle or clip the broom to the dustpan plastic handle for upright storage. It can be stored in the gaps of refrigerators, sinks, washing machines, etc. to save space and keep your home or work space clean and tidy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy, well thought of for convenience, lightweight.
reviews.reviewText: I am in love with this product, it is so easy to assemble and lightweight. I love how it has the tooth scraper it really makes it easy for hair and dust to fall in the dustpan, so no more dirty hands. The instructions are easy. I like the handle on the dustpan it also locks so now I don’t have to pick up broom and dustpan from the floor. Oh and the broom is great to get in corners and for my floor lines it got more that what I have ever dust off, all that dirt trapped in small places. Not to mention the color is super cool it’s a yellow/lime and black. Try it out!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Theres not much to say other than it does the job it’s supposed to do. After 4 back surgeries I have trouble with a regular dustpan. This one fits the bill for me. Broom does a good job. I like the cleaning prongs on the dustpan to get the dust bunnies out of the broom. Minor complaint is that it’s a 2 piece broom, but in nearly a year it’s not given any problems. I even bought one for my mother-in-law. If that’s not a recommendation, I don’t know what is!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good product, Bad sticker placement
reviews.reviewText: The dustpan itself is decent and seems plenty sturdy, etc. The issue I have is the assembly instructions were adhered to the top of the dustpan with a cheap sticker that doesn't peel off, making the dust pan look ugly (especially with the shotty attempt to peel the sticker off)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Didn't pick up anything.
reviews.reviewText: What is the point of a dist pan the doesn't even touch the floor? Dust goes right under the pan. Pointless. Warped plastic. Poor quality. I'll have to go to home Depot. only plus is that they let me return it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easily breaks as the material is not well made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for a quick sweet
reviews.reviewText: Love this little gem, perfect bear quick sweet and you don’t have to use those old fashion. Dust pans. We are constantly bending over to pick things up and or losing them. This is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I love, love ,love this set. I had been looking for something like this for a very long time. I couldn't find it at a regular store and was so happy to find it on amazon. I love how easy it is to use and how easy it is to store. It literally picks up everything the moment you sweep it up. I am going to buy two more for work and my family member. Thanks to this company for making my life easier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hands Down--Best Ever!
reviews.reviewText: I originally bought this for my RV because according to the dimensions, it would fit into the little closet I have. Upon arrival, I immediately assembled it and gave it a try. With 3 dogs, especially a Border Collie who sheds 24/7/365, I really wanted to try it out and I wanted it to work out. Holy cow, this won't even leave my house and now I am forced to buy another one. With rheumatoid arthritis, regular brooms, and dustpans are too much strain on my spine, hips and joints, however, this provides so much overall physical comfort, I am not complaining at all. I read all the negative reviews and if the label on it bothers you, soak it in warn water for 20 minutes and off it comes. I have had no problem getting everything swept up and disposed of. I use it every day to sweep tile and hardwood and it really works! The only thing that is a negative is I keep asking myself, "Why did I wait so long to buy this?"
Resulto un articulo de buena calidad, agradezco que sean cumplidos y tengan buena calidad en sus productos

reviews.reviewTitle: Does what it is supposed to do well
reviews.reviewText: Catches all the dust that is swept up off the floor.
Very strong professional product. Highly recommended

reviews.reviewTitle: Es una escoba compacta, para esconderla facil cuando la guardas
reviews.reviewText: Si es pequeña, pero muy práctica, para barrer ligero o cosas en específico como cuando se te callo un poco de cereal. No la recomiendo para el aseo diario, en mi caso uso una roomba para el diario, y esta escoba me ayuda para cosas muy específicas. Muy buen diseño para departamentos chicos.
